mapper.select: select f.workCode, srlCode, srlMCode, pName, srlEa, workLine, workPeople, workTime, to_char(workStartDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') workStartDate, to_char(workEndDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') workEndDate from fList f join product p on flpCode = pCode join srList s on fldCode = srlCode and flpCode = srlMCode where rownum<=3 order by fldCode desc
select d.dCode, d.dCate, d.dName, d.dDate, e.eName from document d join employees e on d.dWrite = e.eCode where d.dStatus = 0 and d.dcate = 'srl' and rownum<=3 order by d.dCode desc
select pCode, pName, pCate, pPrice, to_char(pDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') pDate, pEa, pImage from product where rownum<=5 order by pCode
select mCode, mName, mCate, mPrice, to_char(mDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') mDate, mEa, mImage from material where rownum<=5 order by mCode

select f.workCode, srlCode, srlMCode, pName, srlEa, workLine, workPeople, workTime, to_char(workStartDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') workStartDate, to_char(workEndDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') workEndDate from fList f join product p on flpCode = pCode join srList s on fldCode = srlCode and flpCode = srlMCode order by f.workCode desc
select d.dCode, d.dCate, d.dName, d.dDate, e.eName from document d join employees e on d.dWrite = e.eCode where d.dStatus = 0 and d.dcate = 'srl' order by d.dCode desc

select d.dCode, d.dCate, d.dName, d.dDate, e.eName from document d join employees e on d.dWrite = e.eCode where d.dStatus = 0 and d.dcate = 'srl' and (d.dName like '%${findStr}%' or e.eName like '%${findStr}%')
select dCode, dWrite, substr(dSign, 0, 5) dSign1, substr(dSign, 7, 5) dSign2, dName, dCont, dDate from document where dCode = #{dCode }
select eName from employees where eCode = #{str }
mapper.insert: insert into fList(workCode, flDcode, flPcode, flpEa, workLine, workPeople, workTime, workStartDate, workEndDate, dys) values(#{srlCode } || #{srlMCode }, #{srlCode }, #{srlMCode }, #{srlEa }, #{workLine }, #{workPeople }, #{pManhour }, #{workStartDate }, #{workEndDate }, #{dys })
mapper.update: update srList set srlStatus = 9 where srlCode = #{srlCode } and srlMCode = #{srlMCode }
mapper.select: select pCode, pName, pCate, pPrice, to_char(pDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') pDate, pEa, pImage from product order by pCode
select pImage from product where pCode = #{pCode }
select mCode, mName, mCate, mPrice, to_char(mDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') mDate, mEa, mImage from material order by mCode
select mImage from material where mCode = #{mCode }
